article:
A poor boy Howard Kelly was trying to make some money for school by selling goods. He found that he had only one coin left. He was so  _  that he decided to beg for a meal at the next house. However, he lost his courage when a lovely young  _  opened the door. Instead of asking for a meal, he asked for a drink of  _  . She smiled understandingly and brought him a  _  glass of milk. He drank it slowly and then asked, "How much is it?"
"You need pay nothing." she replied. "Mother has  _  me never to accept pay for a  _  ." As Howard  left  that house, he not only felt stronger  in body  , but it also made him believe in God and the human beings more. He was about to give up before this.
  _  later, the young woman became very ill. She was sent to the big city,  _  Dr Howard Kelly, now famous, was called in for the treatment. When he heard the name of the  _  she came from, a  _  light filled his eyes. Immediately, he rose and went down through the hospital hall into her room. He  _  her at once. From that day on, he gave  _  attention to her case and  _  to do his best to save her life.
After a long time, she recovered. The bill was sent to her room. She was  _  to open it because she knew it would  _  the rest of her life to pay it off. Finally she looked at the bill and saw these words on one side of it,
"Paid in full with   a glass of milk  ."
                    Dr Howard Kelly
Tears of  _  ran out of her eyes as she cried, "Thank you,  _  . Your love has got around through human hearts and hands. "
